profile.biography: Hello! I'm Shivangi, a Software Developer and Front-end Specialist with over 3 years of experience creating ✨stylish and functional✨ user interfaces using React.js, Material UI, and modern web technologies.
profile.skills: Web Development • UI & UX Design • REST APIs • Mobile Development • SEO

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm an experienced software developer with a strong focus on front-end technologies like React.js, Material UI, and SCSS. I've led multiple impactful projects such as the Har Ghar Tiranga portal and G20 Summit interfaces. I'm passionate about blending design with functionality and creating intuitive, dynamic applications for government and consumer audiences alike.

items.title: UI/UX Design
items.description: Craft responsive, animated, and intuitive user interfaces using tools like Figma, Material UI, and SCSS.

items.title: Frontend Development
items.description: Build scalable and high-performance web apps with React.js, Redux, and RESTful APIs.

items.title: Mobile Development
items.description: Develop cross-platform mobile apps with React Native, integrating AI-powered features and intuitive UX.

items.title: Har Ghar Tiranga
items.description: A national initiative portal for the Indian flag hoisting campaign, featuring interactive maps and user participation.

items.title: Digital Tribute
items.description: An interactive platform showcasing India's cultural heritage and historical significance.

items.title: Swachh Bharat
items.description: Portal for the national cleanliness campaign with real-time progress tracking and community engagement.

items.title: Rashtragaan
items.description: A national anthem platform allowing citizens to record and share their renditions for a unified national composition.

items.title: Pradhanmantri Sangrahalaya
items.description: Digital platform for the Prime Ministers' Museum with virtual tours and interactive exhibits.
